WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL SAMIDA SUFFERED AN EXPLOSION AND FLOODING
VICINITY 39-35.5N 006-28.7E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC LA GARDE, TELEX: 430024,
PHONE: 334 9461 7110, FAX: 334 9427 1149,
E-MAIL: LAGARDE@MRCCFR.EU.
